\documentclass[a4paper,12pt]{exam}
\usepackage{amsmath, amssymb}
\usepackage{enumerate}

\input{config}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% DO NOT EDIT unless you know what you are doing %%%%%%%%
\addpoints

\firstpageheader{}{}{\bf \CourseCode}

\runningfooter
        {\Date}
        {Page \thepage\ of \numpages}
        {\CourseCode~ \Test}
% \headrule


% \footrule
% \cfoot{}

\pointsinrightmargin
\boxedpoints
\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{2.5}
% \renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.2}

\usepackage{tikzpagenodes}
\usepackage{background}
\definecolor{notepadrule}{RGB}{217,244,244}
\backgroundsetup{
scale=1,
angle=0,
opacity=1
}
\renewcommand{\questionshook}{%
        \setlength{\leftmargin}{0.2em}%
        \setlength{\labelsep}{0.50em}%
}

\def\comp{\overline}
\def\gives{\rightarrow}
\def\into{\rightarrow}
\def\bbN{\mathbb{N}}
\def\bbR{\mathbb{R}}
\def\conj{\wedge}
\def\disj{\vee}
\def\imp{\rightarrow}
\def\({\left(}
\def\){\right)}

\begin{document}

% Title area
\begin{center}

        Department of \Department, IIT Palakkad\\
        % Indian Institute of Technology Palakkad
        {\bf \CourseCode~ \CourseName} \\
        \Test{} (\Date) \\
        Time: \Time \hfill Points: \numpoints



        \vspace{1in}
        \noindent
        {\bf Name:} \dotfill

        \bigskip
        \noindent
        {\bf Roll No:} \dotfill

        \vspace{1in}
        \fbox
        {
                \parbox{\textwidth}
                {
                        \medskip
                        \centering{\bf Instructions}
                        \begin{enumerate}
                        \item
                                There are a total of {\bf \numquestions\ questions} in {\bf \numpages\ pages}
                                in this quiz-booklet .
                                Please get a new booklet if any page is missing.
                        \item
                                Write your {\bf name} and {\bf roll number} in the space above.
                    \item
                                Answer each question in the corresponding space provided.
                                Any rough work can be done on the back side of these pages.
                                {\bf No additional sheets} will be provided.
                    \item
                                Write your answers neatly in blue or black {\bf ink}.
                                Do not use pencil or red ink.
                                If the answer is not legible,
                                benefit of doubt will go to the wrong answer.
                        \item
                                Every step in the proofs should be accompanied with
                                a proper justification.
                        \item
                                Do not keep any books, loose sheets of paper, mobile phones or
                                other smart gadgets with you during the exam.
                        \item
                                Good luck!
                \end{enumerate}
                }
        }

\end{center}

        \vspace{0.5in}
        \noindent Space for grades and feedback (do not write anything below)

        \hrule


\newpage

\backgroundsetup{
contents={%
  \begin{tikzpicture}
    \foreach \fila in {-1,0,...,27}
    {
      \draw [line width=1pt,color=notepadrule]
      (current page.west|-0,-\fila*24pt) -- ++(\paperwidth,0);
    }
    \draw[overlay,red!70!black,line width=1pt]
      ([xshift=-1pt]current page text area.west|-current page.north) --
      ([xshift=-1pt]current page text area.west|-current page.south);
  \end{tikzpicture}%
},
scale=1,
angle=0,
opacity=1
}

\begin{questions}
\input{questions}
\end{questions}
\end{document}
